Cheat.Description: Dying a few times in the game is an important part of the game story, so it's highly recommended to die and return back to House of Hades from time to time.
Artefacts are: Ambrosia, Diamond, Titan Blood, Keys, Gemstones, Nectar, Darkness
Cheat.Text: Infinite Artefacts on Get (Must enable MC)

Cheat.Description: Some enemies speed is also effected by this cheat

Cheat.Text: Speed x1.5 (Must enable walk speed MC)
Speed x2 (Must enable walk speed MC)
Speed x3 (Must enable walk speed MC)
